Game.Name: Test Drive II - The Duel (USA, Europe) (Unl)
Game.plot: Test Drive II: The Duel is a Driving game, developed by Distinctive Software and published by Ballistic,which was released in 1992.Cheat: Secret optionsPress and hold A, B and C while driving, this should take you to a secret options screen, where you may change almost anything.Cheat: Turbo Thrust and Custom CarTurbo Thrust For a quick burst of turbo speed during a race, hit A on Controller Two. Custom Car During a race, simultaneously hit L, R, Y, X, B, and A on Controller Two. Release all buttons, and you can now make changes on the Customize Car screen that appears. Press Start on Controller Two to return to the race.
